role.argrole: entity with the right, marked with ل

example.parse: (S (S (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يحقّ) (PP-CLR (PREP ل) (NP (NOUN_PROP عبدالله) (NOUN_PROP+NSUFF_FEM_SG خليفة))) (SBAR-SBJ (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:S يختار) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ-7 (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC حقبة) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الاستعمار) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN الانكليزي)) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN بلاد) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ه)))))) (S (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-7)) (NP-PRD (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC مسرحاً)) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN روايت) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ه)))

arg.g: to choose a period of English colonisation for his country as a stage for his play

example.arg: ان يختار * حقبة الاستعمار الانكليزي لبلاده مسرحاً لروايته
